verbs.description: President Trump [ARGM-TMP: on Tuesday] [V: seemed] [ARG1: eager to salvage a summit with Kim Jong Un that he scrapped days ago] , [ARGM-TMP: as diplomats from the U.S. , North and South Korea and Japan rushed to prepare for a meeting June 12 in Singapore] .

[ARG0: President Trump] on Tuesday seemed eager to [V: salvage] [ARG1: a summit with Kim Jong Un that he scrapped days ago] , as diplomats from the U.S. , North and South Korea and Japan rushed to prepare for a meeting June 12 in Singapore .

President Trump on Tuesday seemed eager to salvage [ARG1: a summit with Kim Jong Un] [R-ARG1: that] [ARG0: he] [V: scrapped] [ARGM-TMP: days ago] , as diplomats from the U.S. , North and South Korea and Japan rushed to prepare for a meeting June 12 in Singapore .
